What is the outlook for Arachnoid Cysts ?,"Untreated, arachnoid cysts may cause permanent severe neurological damage when progressive expansion of the cyst(s) or bleeding into the cyst injures the brain or spinal cord. Symptoms usually resolve or improve with treatment.",NINDS,Arachnoid Cysts
